title: 03/19/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 03/19/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin defends Carson Wentz from his critics and explains why the former Eagles quarterback will succeed with the Colts in 2021. He takes a look at the off season moves made by Jon Gruden and the Raiders and questions if they have a long term plan in place. Colin shares his first look at each division in the NFL and where each team will finish the 2021 season. Plus, new Rams quarterback Matthew Stafford joins the show to tell Colin why he chose to leave the Lions for Los Angeles.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
